results.title: [Effects of simvastatin on plasma levels of lipids, lipoproteins and apolipoproteins in primary hypercholesterolemia].
results.text_hl: If long-term studies confirm its safety, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ will offer excellent prospects for the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Ectrodactyly_cardiopathy_dysmorphism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536187 @@@ischaemic cardiopathy@@@.
